briefdescription.para: : This class is an IJK_Field_local with parallel informations.

detaileddescription.para: Each processor has a sub_box of the global box, and echange_espace_virtuel(n) exchanges n layers of ghost cells, echange_espace_virtuel handles periodicity by copying the first layer into the ghost layer on the opposite side.
